img.title: School Closing info image
img.style: width: 250px; height: 250px; float: right; margin-bottom: 10px; border-width: 1px; border-style: solid; border-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); margin-left: 10px;

span.span: We've put together this page in an effort to make a "one-stop" for all information we currently have related to the school closing. As more information becomes available we will add it here. If you have suggestions of items we can add, what would be helpful to you, please email to berlinj@lamphereschools.org and we'll do our best to track down the info and get it added.

br.span: Thank you for making our Lamphere Community the best around. We are all in this together and we will get through this together.

a.title: State of Michigan Continuity of Learning Plan

span.a: State of Michigan Continuity of Learning Plan

span.a: Lamphere Schools K-5 Continuity of Learning Plan

a.title: Lamphere Schools 6-12 Continuity of Learning Plan

span.a: Lamphere Schools 6-12 Continuity of Learning Plan

span.span: We've compiled a number of Frequently Asked Questions and posted the answers as we know them today. This is a rapidly changing situation and we'll be updating this page as information becomes available.

br.span: If you have questions we haven't addressed here, please let us know by emailing lamphereschools@lamphereschools.org We'll do our best to find answers, reply to you and post here as others are sure to have the same question.

Thank you for working with us as we continue to navigate through this school closure. As always, please know the safety and security of our students, their families, our staff and our community are our number 1 priority.
